Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to panic buttons for drivers of taxicabs, street hail liveries and for-hire vehicles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Panic buttons for drivers of taxicabs, street hail liveries and for-hire vehicles.
